name: Flixel Bord
description:
Imagine Flappy Bird... but bad.... introducing Flixel Bord

a subpar flappy bird clone made in HaxeFlixel
as a tutorial project in 24 hours

game sucks, HaxeFlixel doesn't

try it. now

also yeah you can play the game,
click to jump
dodge the pipes
that's all

music kinda slaps though
i wonder who wrote it
